short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension brings the warm glow of the golden hour into your browser stunning landscape

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The soft glow of the sunset and nature's serene beauty will accompany your browsing experience. This extension not only provides aesthetic beauty but also enhances productivity with built-in Timer, Calculator, and News features. Stay informed and organized without leaving your new tab page.

Key features:

- Beautiful background with dimming functionality for a more subtle appearance when needed.
- Background refresh feature that allows backgrounds to change periodically.
- Quick access to frequently visited sites.
- Customizable search bar and shortcuts.
- Timer and Calculator Features.
- New RSS feed integration for the latest updates.
